verbs.description: [ARG0: criminals] [V: trying] [ARG1: to seize justice system romania] president on tuesday blasted the ruling party leader as a criminal at the top of the state apparatus saying politicians with criminal convictions are trying to take over the country justice system and undermine efforts to fight corruption president klaus iohannis was hitting back at liviu dragnea chairman of the ruling social democratic party who earlier accused him of not declaring a rent contract and other misdemeanors iohannis called the allegations fake news something we 'd have called plain lies in the past bucharest romania u s vera jourova president klaus iohannis commissioner social democratic party romania klaus iohannis social democratic party liviu dragnea chairman president european union
